Name: Police Hot Pursuit
About the game: If you like the adventures and cars then Police Hot Pursuit is for you! Take a car or even a bike and let the adventure begins! Escape the cops and avoid obstacles as long as possible. Game Features: - 5 cars, 1 bike & 1 motorcycle available to use - Weather changes like dense fog - Collectable items which will help you to escape the cops
